question: Which among the following is considered as Booth Capturing?
option3: Preventing any elector from going to polling station
explanation:
Booth capturing includes the following-
(i) seizure of a polling station and making polling authorities surrender ballot papers or voting machines. 
(ii) taking possession of polling station and allowing only oneâ€™s own supporters to exercise their franchise.
(iii) threatening and preventing any elector from going to polling station.
